peril.views.slick.components.menus

Class PauseMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Viewable
      • peril.views.slick.util.Clickable
        • peril.views.slick.components.menus.Menu
          • peril.views.slick.components.menus.PauseMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Container

    public final class PauseMenu
extends Menu
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a Pause Menu.
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.05
    Author:
    Ezekiel_Trinidad, Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Menu
